> Apart from the inline nitpicks, I wonder if we should take this as an opportunity to reorganise a few files. E.g., we could have a new `LieSubalgebra` folder containing: `Basic` (current contents of `LieSubalgebra.lean`) `Cartan` `Engel`

Sounds good. We can do that in a follow-up as well.
bors merge

Thanks, this is great.

Apart from the inline nitpicks, I wonder if we should take this as an opportunity to reorganise a few files. E.g., we could have a new `LieSubalgebra` folder containing:
`Basic` (current contents of `LieSubalgebra.lean`)
`Cartan`
`Engel`

bors d+

This is exactly `LinearMap.pow_map_zero_of_le`.
```suggestion
```
I think the poor naming in this corner of the library contributed to not finding `LinearMap.pow_map_zero_of_le`. (There are a bunch of lemmas here that are about `pow` but whose name incorrectly says `iterate` and the lemma `LinearMap.pow_map_zero_of_le` should really be named `LinearMap.pow_apply_zero_of_le`.)
Ok, I'll just remove this. These changes should be done in a follow-up PR.

```suggestion
    ((ad R H x ^ n) y : L) = (ad R L x ^ n) y :=
  LieSubmodule.coe_toEndomorphism_pow R H L H.toLieSubmodule x y n
```
Thanks!

I claim this is slightly less brittle / more maintainable:
```suggestion
    rw [add_comm]
    refine congr_arg₂ _ rfl (sum_congr rfl fun ⟨i, j⟩ hij ↦ ?_)
    replace hij : n = j + i := by rwa [mem_antidiagonal, add_comm, eq_comm] at hij
    rw [Nat.choose_symm_of_eq_add hij]
```
(though feel free to disagree)
Thanks, I combined this with some other changes. Hopefully you like the improvement.

```suggestion

local notation "φ" => LieModule.toEndomorphism R L M

```
I sometimes use this notation. It makes some of the below statements (and especially infoview state) a lot easier to read.
Thanks, implemented.

Some people disagree with me on this:
```suggestion
/-- A Lie-subalgebra of an Artinian Lie algebra is self-normalizing
```
so feel free to ignore. (I do note that we are capitalising `Lie` though.)

(IIRC Dijkstra joked that the supreme achievement is to have one's surname become an adjective that is so familiar that it is no longer capitalised.)
Thanks, fixed everywhere.

```suggestion
/-- A Lie subalgebra of a Noetherian Lie algebra is nilpotent
```
(again, feel free to ignore)
Idem

I _think_ initial uppercase is only for `Prop`-valued definitions.
```suggestion
def engel (x : L) : LieSubalgebra R L :=
```
Thanks, fixed everywhere.

Thanks, this is great.

Apart from the inline nitpicks, I wonder if we should take this as an opportunity to reorganise a few files. E.g., we could have a new `LieSubalgebra` folder containing:
`Basic` (current contents of `LieSubalgebra.lean`)
`Cartan`
`Engel`

bors d+
